org.digijava.kernel.util.collections

Class CollectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.util.collections.CollectionUtils

  • public class CollectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains utillities which manipulate collections. Such as synchronization of child lists for hibernate-persisted classes, etc.

        Generate object's hierarchy within the collection and returns collection of the parent nodes
        Parameters:
        source - Source collection
        definition - HierarchyDefinition object, which defines hierarchy of objects, contained in the source collection
